articles.description: The 54-year-old (left) will make his long-awaited, albeit controversial, return to the ring against Roy Jones Jr, but his sights are set to raising money for charity in the future through exhibitions.
articles.content:
Mike Tyson has sensationally admitted he would be open to the idea of facing three of boxing's heavyweight stars in a series of exhibition bouts for charity.
The 54-year-old will make his long-await… [+2754 chars]
